name: Murilo Vicente Gonçalves Da Silva
content: Murilo V. G. da Silva Murilo V. G. da Silva Associate Professor at Federal University of Parana (UFPR) Curitiba, Brazil PhD in Computer Science (2008) University of Leeds, UK MSc (2004) and BSc (2002) in Computer Science Universidade Federal do Parana, Brazil Academic timeline: - Associate Professor at UFPR (2018 to now) - Associate Professor at UTFPR (2010 to 2017) - Visiting Scholar at Simon Fraser University (2014 -- 2015) - Postdoc at COPPE-UFRJ (2009 -- 2009) - PhD student at University of Leeds (2004 -- 2009) Research interests: Theoretical Computer Science Complexity: Computational, Kolmogorov, Rademacher, etc Graph theory and algorithmic graph theory Here a list of Publications Here my Teaching Activities (in portuguese): Murilo Vicente Gonçalves da Silva murilo@inf.ufpr.br 14th March 2019
